body.p: At the date of initial application an entity may designate:

li.p: a financial asset as measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 4.1.5; or
an investment in an equity instrument as at fair value through other comprehensive income in accordance with paragraph 5.7.5.

body.p: Such a designation shall be made on the basis of the facts and circumstances that exist at the date of initial application. That classification shall be applied retrospectively.
